description: Immutable representation of a chess piece in the backend domain model. Defines Piece class with properties for type and color, and methods to access attributes and represent the piece as a string.

classes.name: Piece
classes.description: Immutable class representing a chess piece with type and color. Provides getter methods and string representation.

methods.name: Piece
methods.description: Constructor that initializes the Piece with a specified type and color, ensuring neither is null.

methods.name: getType
methods.description: Returns the type of the chess piece.

methods.name: getColor
methods.description: Returns the color of the chess piece.

methods.name: is
methods.description: Checks if the piece has the specified color.

methods.name: isType
methods.description: Checks if the piece is of the specified type.

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Provides a string representation of the piece, using uppercase for White and lowercase for Black pieces, with characters indicating the type.
